memberdef.type: THE ORACLE WILL TAKE ITS POSITION IN ORDER TO UNDERSTAND WHERE TO SEND THE HINT VIA TOPIC **place the *cluedo_link *near to the manipulator Done thenode will receive a message from the topic oracle_hint of type erl2 ErlOracle msg first of the system should *infer *the solution *as integer ID send a request to the service oracle_solution of type erl2 oracle msg the source code simulation cpp exposes two important the Oracle will publish only the hints referred to the winID i e the selected winner ID it allows to make quicker the testing because you haven t unvalid hints from the as well as several different IDs to manage use this setting for testing only the macro should be set to true DIST_THRESH the oracle sends a hint only when the cleudo_link of the robot has a distance from the marker which is lower than this value the default value is by increasing
